agents.name: Aomni
agents.shortDescription: AI agent platform that accelerates sales efficiency for B2B sales teams
agents.longDescription: Aomni is an AI-powered platform designed to assist sales teams in converting leads into won deals more efficiently. It automates prospect research, generates detailed account plans, and provides personalized insights. Aomni uses advanced AI models to browse the internet, extract relevant information from trustworthy sources, and synthesize it into actionable intelligence for sales professionals
keyFeatures: Automated web research and information extraction, Customized account plan generation, Personalized AI training for specific products and ICPs, Interactive AI chatbot for instant queries, N-Layer search powered by AI models
useCases: Generating detailed account strategies for sales leads, Identifying relevant opportunities for target accounts, Uncovering buying triggers from news and social media, Optimizing sales velocity with AI-crafted outreach messaging, Conducting market research for entering new industries
agents.tags: AI agent, sales intelligence, account-based selling, web research, business intelligence

agents.name: SalesAPE AI
agents.shortDescription: AI-powered sales agents that qualify leads and close deals 24/7
agents.longDescription: SalesAPE.ai is a platform that allows businesses to train and deploy AI sales representatives that mimic their best team members. These AI agents can engage with customers instantly, qualify leads, answer complex questions, and even close sales autonomously. The system uses advanced AI technology to provide personalized, round-the-clock sales support, enhancing efficiency and boosting conversion rates for businesses
keyFeatures: Instant lead engagement, Custom AI training, Autonomous meeting scheduling, Complex question answering, E-commerce conversion optimization
useCases: Lead qualification, Customer service support, Sales pitch automation, Meeting scheduling, E-commerce sales conversion

agents.name: Opencord AI
agents.shortDescription: AI agents creating and sharing unique social media content around the clock
agents.longDescription: Opencord AI is a platform that utilizes a team of collaborative AI agents to generate and manage social media content continuously. It aims to provide round-the-clock creativity and value to users' social feeds, offering personalized interactions and customer targeting. The system is designed to support various industries, including e-commerce, crypto, and indie hacking
agents.tags: social media, ai agent, twitter, automation
useCases: Social media content generation and scheduling
Crypto and indie hacking project promotion
Freelance team simulation for small businesses

agents.name: Artisan
agents.shortDescription: Platform for hiring digital AI workers to automate sales and marketing tasks.
agents.longDescription: Artisan is a platform designed to provide businesses with digital workers, known as "Artisans," which are AI-driven agents capable of automating a wide range of sales and marketing tasks. The platform includes features such as lead identification, personalized email writing, and outbound automation. Artisans are designed to act as additional team members, seamlessly integrating with existing workflows to enhance productivity and efficiency. The AI agents are capable of learning and optimizing their performance over time, providing businesses with a scalable solution for managing their sales and marketing operations.
agents.tags: AI sales assistant, digital workers, automation, marketing, business development

agents.name: AskToSell
agents.shortDescription: AI agent platform for personalized customer engagement and sales automation.
agents.longDescription: AskToSell is a platform that leverages AI agents to enhance customer engagement by understanding long-tail customers and creating personalized success plans. The AI agents are designed to influence customer decisions throughout their journey, thereby increasing sales and revenue. The platform allows account managers to manage a significantly larger number of customers, reportedly enabling a 10x increase in customer service capacity and a 30% revenue uplift through scaled 1:1 coverage. AskToSell focuses on upselling to existing customers as a cost-effective growth strategy and provides tools like Sales Playbooks to automate revenue workflows.
agents.tags: AI sales agents, customer engagement, upselling, revenue automation, personalized marketing

agents.name: Yala
agents.shortDescription: AI-powered sales agents for WhatsApp
agents.longDescription: Yala provides AI-powered sales agents that operate 24/7 on WhatsApp to accelerate sales for businesses. These agents use advanced AI to interact naturally with customers, answer product questions, guide them through the purchasing process, and apply effective sales strategies to maximize conversions and revenue.
agents.tags: AI sales agents, conversational AI, e-commerce automation, WhatsApp marketing, customer service

agents.name: Salezilla
agents.shortDescription: AI-powered cold email and sales automation platform
agents.longDescription: Salezilla is an advanced AI-driven platform designed to automate and enhance cold email outreach for sales teams. It uses artificial intelligence to generate precise lead lists, personalize email content, and manage email infrastructure to improve deliverability. The platform aims to streamline the sales process by reducing prospecting time and increasing the effectiveness of outreach campaigns.
agents.tags: AI sales automation, cold email marketing, lead generation, sales productivity, email personalization

agents.name: 11x.ai
agents.shortDescription: AI-powered virtual employee platform for sales automation
agents.longDescription: 11x.ai is an AI-driven platform that provides virtual employees, like Alice the AI Sales Development Representative, to automate repetitive sales tasks. It aims to boost productivity and reduce costs by handling tasks from prospecting to closing deals, working alongside human teams to amplify their potential
agents.tags: AI sales automation, Virtual employees, B2B lead generation, Sales productivity, AI-powered SDR

agents.name: AiSDR
agents.shortDescription: AiSDR - the first AI sales outreach agent that can hold a meaningful conversation
agents.longDescription:
AiSDR is the first AI SDR that people cannot tell apart from human and that holds an actual end-to-end conversation with prospects. The AI can expertly tackle any incoming questions and objections with the goal to convert leads via emails, LinkedIn messages, and texts. AiSDR always responds to leads in <10 min, securing the highest possible conversion rates, and runs on complete autopilot without needing human oversight. 

AiSDR provides the best quality of AI outreach for inbound and outbound due to (1) pro-level configuration of the AI for each client that allows the agent to mimic the writing style, (2) 50+ top-performing email frameworks from sales leaders, (3) LinkedIn personalization of every message with the latest 3 posts and bio.
keyFeatures: Intent prospecting capabilities that let clients find prospects with an appetite for their solution, and keep the AI searching for time-sensitive signals (such as recent funding, hiring for a specific job position, tech stack used, news and search mentions),
AI-generated memes and video pitches with salespeople's replicas,
Personalization of messages with HubSpot CRM data,
useCases: Cold outreach, Inbound lead nurturing, Closed-lost deals reactivation, Booking sales meetings, Converting free trial users into paid customers, Upselling and cross-selling products, Processing book demo requests
agents.tags: AI SDR, Sales AI, AI for prospecting, AI for outbound, AI for email outreach

agents.name: Rep AI
agents.shortDescription: Drive Sales, Delight Customers – Powered by Rep AI
agents.longDescription: Rep AI is the ultimate AI sales and support concierge, designed to help eCommerce brands connect with customers when it matters most. By engaging shoppers with smart, human-like interactions when it's needed, Rep AI transforms interest into sales and provides seamless support that enhances customer satisfaction. With proactive assistance, actionable insights, and an intuitive setup, Rep AI makes it simple for brands to boost conversions and streamline support, all while staying true to their unique brand voice.
keyFeatures: Behavioral AI that Detects disengaged shoppers and re-engages them at just the right moment,
Handles the majority of inquiries instantly/ including order management and task support,
Data-Driven Insights: Offers actionable analytics to understand what shoppers want and where they face challenges,
Free trial and a traffic-based subscription model—pay based website sessions/ not conversations.
agents.tags: eCommerce, CRO, shopper journey, Customer Support, chatbot, Conversational AI

agents.name: Wizy.Pro
agents.shortDescription: AI sales agent boost conversions with personalized support.
agents.longDescription: Wizy.pro empowers brands to deliver AI-powered e-commerce experiences that feel personal and engaging. Acting as an AI sales assistant, Wizy.pro’s intelligent agents guide customers through tailored journeys, increasing conversions and enhancing customer satisfaction. Unlike traditional chatbots, Wizy.pro integrates AI in customer support with advanced tools from OpenAI and Google Vertex AI, enabling agents to provide context-aware recommendations. Perfect for companies focused on AI customer service and AI for e-commerce, Wizy.pro centralizes key data for a seamless, effective customer experience. Visit our website to learn more.
keyFeatures: AI Sales Agents: Intelligent agents that drive conversions by providing personalized, context-aware customer interactions.
Advanced AI Integration: Combines OpenAI and Google Vertex AI for enhanced, natural conversational support.
Centralized Brand Hub: Streamlines data management and real-time synchronization across platforms.
Seamless Integration: Connects easily with Shopify and other platforms for a consistent user experience.
Insightful Dashboards: Provides real-time insights into customer behavior and engagement trends.
useCases: E-commerce Optimization: Guides customers through their shopping journey with tailored recommendations, increasing conversion rates.
Enhanced Customer Support: Acts as a proactive AI-driven support assistant that answers queries naturally and effectively.
Digital Marketing Engagement: Personalizes customer interactions to improve engagement and brand loyalty.
Data-Driven Decision Making: Offers valuable insights into customer preferences, aiding in strategy and product optimization.

agents.name: Solda AI
agents.shortDescription: AI sales reps for enterprise that close deals by voice and text
agents.longDescription:
Scale instantly without spending any resources on hiring. Solda AI sales reps call leads over the phone, qualify them, and book meetings without bloating sales dept budget. They work 24/7 with human-level performance or better and have a detection rate of <1%.

Backed by Accel and supported by top VCs and Sequoia/Index scouts, Solda is setting a new standard in AI-driven sales.

We'll get you set up in just three weeks. All we need is 10 of your recorded calls and your sales script.
keyFeatures: Lead qualification, Objection handling, Meeting scheduling, Upselling, Passing the secretary
useCases: Execute full sales cycle to scale instantly without spending any resources on hiring, Reactivate leads that otherwise would have been lost, Qualify leads perfectly without hiring SDRs, Upsell products to grow extra revenue at no cost for marketing, Pass the secretary and schedule meetings with decision-makers

agents.name: Alora
agents.shortDescription: AI agents making calls on your behalf
agents.longDescription: Alora is a cutting-edge AI agent platform that allows you to deploy autonomous agents to make phone calls, execute tasks, and provide detailed summaries. Designed to handle outbound calls for tasks like sales, customer service, and surveys, Alora is built to help businesses scale their outreach efficiently and cost-effectively.
keyFeatures: Autonomous AI agents for real-time phone calls
Clear call summaries for every interaction
Supports simultaneous multi-agent deployment (B2B version coming soon)
Easy-to-use interface for creating call prompts

Customer service teams automating routine calls

agents.name: AI Chatbot Support
agents.shortDescription: Multi platform AI and Live Chat Customer Support CMS
agents.longDescription:
Want to wow your customers with amazing support? AI Chatbot Support is here to help! We're an AI platform that makes it easy to provide outstanding service across all your communication channels.

Here's how we make support a breeze:

Instant Answers, Happy Customers: Say goodbye to frustrating wait times! Our friendly AI chatbot provides immediate answers to common questions, so your customers feel valued and heard right away.
Personalized Service with a Human Touch: We combine the efficiency of AI with the warmth of human interaction. Our platform lets your agents focus on building relationships and solving those tricky problems that need a personal touch. Connect Everywhere: Chat with your customers wherever they are!
keyFeatures: Supercharge Your Support Team: Give your agents superpowers with AI-powered tools! Features like Smart Reply, Spelling Correction, and Automatic Translation help them work faster and provide top-notch support.
Show Off Your Brand: Make sure your chatbot looks and feels like a part of your team. Customize its appearance and messages to match your brand's personality.
Learn and Grow: Our smart analytics dashboard helps you understand your customers better. Track key metrics, identify trends, and discover new ways to improve your support.
useCases: Automate the Boring Stuff: Let our AI handle the repetitive tasks, so your team can focus on building relationships and solving complex issues.
Personalize Every Interaction: Deliver tailored support that makes each customer feel valued and understood.
Make Smarter Decisions: Use our data-driven insights to improve your support strategy and grow your business.

agents.name: Delegate
agents.shortDescription: AI Account Management for your long tail customers
agents.longDescription:
Delegate is an agent that predicts, prioritises and executes churn prevention, upsell and education on your long tail customers. It enables one person to create the experience of a dedicated customer success manager to thousands of customers and directly drive revenue.

Simple to setup, Delegate integrates into your sales, support and product tools and communicates with you in the tools you use the most.
keyFeatures: Real-time Analysis of all your customer data

agents.name: Cynthia AI

You can enable your team with rich prospect insights and multi-channel engagement across LinkedIn and email. Cynthia helps land more meetings with qualified leads with better research of each prospect.
Start with a Free Trial, no card required.

agents.name: Lumi

agents.name: Katie AI SDR
agents.shortDescription: Your Data-Driven AI SDR, Boosting Productivity and Delivering Results 24/7.
agents.longDescription: Katie is your data-driven AI SDR that transforms your outreach with cutting-edge AI. By analyzing 50+ data sources, including your CRM and real-time buying signals, she identifies your Ideal Customer Profile (ICP) and high-value prospects, automating research and prospecting. With advanced lead scoring and intent detection, Katie prioritizes the right leads at the right time, ensuring you're always engaging with the most promising prospects. Available 24/7, she crafts personalized, multi-channel messages at scale, driving higher response rates and boosting your pipeline with more qualified meetings.
keyFeatures: Prospecting & Researching:Katie analyzes  50+ data sources, including your CRM and buying signals to identify your ICP and high-value prospects, automating research and prospecting while adjusting targeting in real-time.
Lead Scoring: Katie analyzes buying signals and triggers and detect buyer intent, enabling you to prioritize prospects in your outreach and reach right people at the right time.
Multi-channel Personalization at Scale, 24/7: Kati uses research data to craft highly personalized messages tailored to your target persona, driving higher reply rates and more meetings.
